content.detailedDescription:
I was outside by the pool with some with my girlfriend and a friend.  i was checking out the stars and the aircraft in the area looking for potential ufos (as i am interested in the subject but had never actually seen one) when i noticed that one of the things moving in the sky was not blinking like normal aircraft. a solid white light was traveling across the sky at a fairly slow and constant speed. i took out my phone and began recording the object until it ultimately vanished. shortly after, a large, loud, low-flying jet (possibly military) flew overhead flying in roughly the same direction .  i recorded this jet with my phone until it flew too far to see on my phone. we continued watching the sky and the fairly large amount of air traffic in the sky seem to clear out of the area.  over the course of about maybe fifteen or twenty minutes we watched the several aircraft in the area seem to be clearing out of the area. heading off towards lancaster or harrisburg at fairly high rates of speed.  after most of the aircraft had cleared out of the area two aircraft came into view from the direction where the object had disappeared flying parallel to each other very fast and  at high altitude we assumed that they were military fighter jets. they stayed in formation for a while until one took the lead as they increased speed and both took off in the direction that the low flying jet had gone.  these jets were flying too high to capture with my phone.  a couple minutes passed when we saw what looked like the original object coming back from where it vanished and was heading in the direction that the jets were going. it still had the same slow steady pace as before only this time the solid unblinking light was slightly orange.  before i could get out my phone to record it again it suddenly vanished. again, a large, loud, low-flying jet (possibly military) flew over us and i recorded it on my phone.  after this there were almost no aircraft in the sky other than a small scattering of planes and possibly a helicopter. this is somewhat strange as there is usually a fair amount of air traffic going on in our area most of the time.  i also believe it should be noted that the object we witnessed was not blinking a strobe like normal aircraft. it was a continuous light both times it was sighted.  i can't say for sure what i saw, but i know that this is one of the strangest things i've ever seen and figured i might as well put it out there. 

file 1: ufo
file 2: low jet #1
file 3: low jet #2
content.summary: Object flew overhead at a slow and steady pace before ultimately disappearing. later similar or the same object came back towards us and vanished. strange air traffic followed both events.

content.detailedDescription: It showed up after attempting suicide, i affect television, radio, and cell phone. it scans my body and surrounding with a white beam. i felt hot and paralyzed me, could run to get camera. my cell was not working all electronics where acting funny and radio was making weird noises. there was noise coming from the roof and kitchen, there was 2 hour loss of time. the ufo was bright purple with magenta color, very bright and tons of wires. the lights where white and brown. it flu up after a the helicopter  noises where heard. all witness are been blackmailed and threatened . i was told i was going to end up dead or in jail if keep sharing my info or experience.  i have dreams of ufo mother ship preventing natural disasters ,also get pick up by a grey oval ufo . inside there is lights , big nuclear core at center , and chairs with  two green  aliens and ton of small black shadows. my family sent me to go see a paranormal investigator to remove all the bad . i am mexican and you’re thought that ufo are from hell or a sign of holy dead. my life is not the same , people think i am crazy now.Please record and remember that my life at risk passed lie detector test.
content.summary: Cone ufo

content.detailedDescription: Didn't actually see it in the sky, only noticed it in the pictures of the sunset i was taking later at home.  taken in the taos wal-mart parking lot as i was walking into the store.
content.summary: Pictures of lights in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
content.summary: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

content.detailedDescription:
My  two daughter and i just got back home from my mothers house that friday night august 7th at approximately 9:20pm. before pulling into our driveway, my 10 year old asked me what that bright orange light in the sky was. i replied that i didn't know, wait until we park and i'll check it out. after parking in our driveway, my daughters and i immediately saw this light or orb slowly moving across the sky from the east and heading west with a slight flickering. my first thought was it was a lantern, but it was moving to fast and consistent to be a lantern. my seven year old lost interest but my 10 year old and i continued to watch this object moving slowly across the sky without making any sound. once in the western sky the object completely vanished. the western sky wasn't completely dark yet, and this object seem to disappear from a bright light to nothing at all. i was able to take a picture of this object or light with my phone when it was over our heads. after disappearing we went into the house to tell my wife about it. her reply was it was probably a lantern. my 10 year old and i continued to watch the sky for the next 15 minutes to a half an hour before seeing another light moving across the sky from the east. my daughter immediately told my wife and she came out to witness it for herself. the four of us watched this light slowly moving across the sky heading west and then changing direction to the northwestern sky. instead of vanishing like the first on did, the second one just kind of faded into the sky. 
  this is the first time ever witnessing anything like this, and honestly it made me feel a bit frightened after seeing them.
content.summary: Spotted two ufo's in the night sky that were coming from the east  and slowly heading toward the west,

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunny day with large white clouds. they were moving from the southwest to northeast. i noticed what i thought was a small cloud heading in the opposite direction. it came from behind a cloud and followed a straight path to the southwest. as i looked at it i knew it wasn't a cloud because it was triangular in shape. it looked like a fat paper airplane. i waited this long to report it because i wanted to see if i could be something simple. but i have no explanation. it was not a plane because the sun was out and a plane even all white will be darker on the bottom or sides. this object had no shadowing effect almost if it was white and translucent . it also made no noise or left a vapor trail. it was like nothing i have ever seen. it was not traveling very fast and stayed in a straight line. i have tried to find something to compare it to but i haven't seen anything like it.
content.summary: Witnessed unfamiliar craft all white, triangular in shape traveling in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: the night of august 15th i was outside with my girlfriends siblings  and father, when one of her brothers called my name and said hey look in the sky it looks like a ball of fire! we all immediately got up and got in to a better position  to observe this object. i pulled my phone out and began recording unfortunately  it didnt do the object justice. the object is not a typical aircraft usually  seen in the sky i.E helicopter, airplane, blimp. the object looked to be a diamond shape glowing orange/red sort of like a ball of fire in the sky. while trying to record its travel we sort of lost the object  in camera view due to an outdoor motion light. but the object, while still easily visible, just disappeared.
content.summary: Object seemed to be diamond shape glowing orange/red looked like as if it were on fire. noticeably not a typical helicopter  or airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was just sittin' there minding my own business when all of a sudden there arose such a clatter that i raced to the window to see what was the matter.
content.summary: I seen a ufo and it flew like a shot over them thar trees

content.detailedDescription: I was shutting down my computer when the motion detection alarm sounded on my computer. i checked the camera video but there was nothing on it. checked the still photos and that was when i found the images. at first i thought it was a firefly or something of that matter, but realized that fireflies don't leave trails like in the photo. i didn't pay much attention until it showed up the second and third night. that was when i thought it was something different. i was not able to observe it firsthand, i only saw it in the photos. after the second night i thought it was kind of spooky.
content.summary: Surveillance camera motion detection activated camera and captured the photos.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to my front porch to smoke and i looked at the sky as i always do just to see the stars. i looked in the southwestern sky and noticed an odd shaped reddish orange light above a ridge close by i pointed it out to my husband and he said oh it's just the moon covered by clouds. i showed him the moon was very visible in on the opposite side in the northeastern sky. the light started out as a long shape similar to a comet but it was not moving just hovering there above the tree line. it was partly cloudy and you could see the clouds and sky below the object illuminated like the object was shining a light down from it. there is normally frequent air traffic in this area of the sky and i found it strange i was seeing no airplane activity. the light began to fade and seemed as if the object turned but i could still see a trail coming from it although it really hadn't changed position in the sky it seemed stationary other than the dimming of the light. we observed this for about ten minutes and it was just a hovering orb shaped light that seemed to get dim and then brighter still with the area below very illuminated. then we began to see a lot of air traffic and we watched the orb just disappear. there were several airplanes but we noticed two in particular that continued to circle this area where the orb had been. they may have been helicopters not sure bc of the distance and cloud cover. we watched two airplanes or helicopters circle this area and descend lower in the sky directly over the ridge where we had just seen the strange orb light. then all of a sudden the air and field around us began to get very foggy and the sky very cloudy to the point we could no longer see anything in the sky so we went inside and began to discuss how we just saw a ufo.
content.summary: Observed strange light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My family and were on vacation. we were on the deck to the house we had. my mom noticed this orange light in the sky over the gulf of mexico. so we started to watch this orange light move. from were we noticed it it was moving north to south.As we're watching it at one point it stoped moving hovered and then turned almost 90 degrees. and came towardsthe house we were staying at which was in a western direction. then the ufo started tho blink and then it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo flying n. to s stop, hover,turns heads west

content.detailedDescription:
3 of us idaho backcountry ladies ride in the wilderness every wednesday. we were in jedidiah wilderness, teton county wyoming going to granite lake. we never saw this light and we did not hear any close planes.When i viewed the sd card i was surprised to see this light. we did not leave the trailhead until 10 am and this point of the ride had to be about 12-1 pm.The area we were riding in is west of the grand teton is and where the sun rose. you can see the shadows of the trees are early.
we are very surprised about this and looking for a explanation if possible.
i have sent 4 photos. 2 leading up to the gorgeous mountain we were approaching, and 2 with the illuminated oblong light. 
 thank you for viewing.

terri in idaho
content.summary: Shere in photo take that was moving but not observed by horse riders

content.detailedDescription: I was in backyard out corner of eye noticed what thought was star but it started descend thought it was shooting star but descended in straight path methodically at steady pace . then saw plane approaching between 8 and 9 pm couldve swore they were gonna collide but somehow someway it didnt observed it descending for 5 to ten minutes. where it appeared to just vanish into what i can only assume was into the ocean in what had to be either right near or just outside of where the bermuda triangle begins.
content.summary: Ufo descended from sky at steady pace almost hit plane then went into ocean

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my apartment and notice 6 to 10 ufo's hovering and flashing lights, spaced out like stars. these ufo's have been there every since i first reported to mufon the sighting i had on february 8th 2014. every clear night you can see these objects with 3 to 5 cessna planes flying around observing them. i've actually see these things fly with their lights on then disappear into then air.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 to 10 ufo's hovers over my apartment building every single night

content.detailedDescription: It was very hot out, and the grandchildren were staying with us so we took them to the lake to swim.  when we got out to the island we were going to, they asked what that light in the sky was..We did not know...It was a ways east of the sun and bright, but we could look at it without hurting our eyes.  it did not move.  i took pictures of it anyway.  i tried to get one with the top of a tree or something in it, but it was so high up i couldn't get anything else in the pictures.  we watched for about 10 minutes, but nothing was happening, so we went about our business.  i checked every once in a while--it was there for a little while, then when i looked again, it was just gone--didn't see it leave. when we got home i put them on the computer...There were small white things in almost all the pictures, in different places around the large "thing".  when we zoomed in on the little while things, we could see a shape  one of the grandsons pointed out that the small thing looks just like the things on space invaders....
content.summary: Grandchildren pointed out light in the sky, took pics, realized what they were when we put them on the computer

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the dock at my cottage on the west side of a bay about 20 ft. from shore listening to music with ear buds on my iphone. sky was relatively clear and numerous stars visible. at 11:45pm i saw a round orange glowing light emerge into view about 60-70 degrees above the horizon after passing the tree line along the shore. when it came into view it was only about 15 degrees from vertical to the west. it travelled in fairly straight path from west to east and same elevation with fluid motion. first reaction was wow, what the hell is that. i've seen planes and shooting stars over the lake but nothing like this. in about 5-7 seconds it travelled out of site to the east but just before it did, another appeared, identical to the first, at the same location just east avove the tree line and travelled in the same direction and path, west to east. again as it started to disappear out of view to the west a third orange light appeared again the same location and travelling in similar path and speed. again as it moved west a fourth light appeared in view in same location above the tree line and moved to the west. this light was still visible to the west when the 5th light appeared, again same starting view point for me when it passed over the tree line just east. after being amazed about what i was witnessing i realized they were not making any sound (i removed my ear buds when i saw the second light). i turned the camera on my phone and snapped 3 photos. i switched to video as the 5th light moved away to the west althgough this one seemed to adjust speed slightly up and down. then the 6th light appeared again from above the tree line and started moving west as the others did but this one stopped. it hovered in the sky moving slightly up and down and east and west. it seemed to know i was recording and was watching me. this freaked me out but i kept recording until it moved out of site to the west. this was the last light i saw. i realized later the flash on my phone rendered the photos useless as there was just a white haze in the photo. the flash was on the whole time during video but even with the white haze you can still see the lights moving in the background although you can see the orange glow as it actually appeared.There are also a few moths flying through the video shot in the light of the cameras flash but they're obvious.The lights were not all exactly evenly spaced but with nothing for a reference it's difficult to tell how big they were and the space between them. to recap, 6 lights with an orange glow moving in a very fluid motion horizontally across the sky with the last one stopping and hovering up & down and east & west before heading west and disappearing.
content.summary: 6 round independant orange lights spaced 400-800 ft. apart moved across the sky over lac cayamant. last one stopped and hovered up and down.

content.detailedDescription:
I was awoken from a deep sleep my room was lit up my big window was open and sat up in bed and looked out the window i saw all these small beings about 3 foot tall glowing childlike little beings. they seemed very happy and i felt very safe and not scared at all. my boyfriend was asleep in the bed next to me and never woke up. a little beings came from a light that came straight down into my backyard. my dogs there they never barked and kept by my side. i got up out of bed to go see what was going on. i went to the sliding glass door in the next room as i got to the door the little beings were there to greet me.  i was still not scared at all i walked out the door but my two dogs stay inside which is not like them. they bark at everything but they were very quiet and stayed inside. the beings were playing around me and it was like they where and having fun getting me laughing. they felt very happy pulled me toward the light. they pulled me to the tunnel of the light and i went up into the light and i don't remember anything beyond that. i believe this happened for three nights in a row and on the third night i was awakened by a tall bald man wearing strange white and silver clothing he looked just like the statue of a man found at
göbekli tepe. he had come to get me again and this time i was tired and did not want to be woken up i did not want to go with him and i grabbed a pillow off the bed and threw it at him and said i don't want to go anymore and that was the last i ever seen of them. i drew a picture of him in a journal as i have told the story to other people. when i was watching the tv show ancient aliens i saw the statue of the man and realized that was him which made me decide to tell you about this. i also had a small incision on my right ankle on the inside in the shape of a triangle after this happened. he was bald and had very high cheekbones. you never spoke to me none of them spoke to me it was all feelings.
content.summary: Beam of light came down. small child like beans pulled me toward the light. one tall men bald wearing strange close

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my office for lunch and looked up from the western sidewalk beside the building while walking north.

one traveled west to east and another in the opposite.  they slowed and met then continued after only a couple of seconds together.  they did not touch or bump.  one was slightly more north.  they paused before they were beside one another.  the one heading west paused for a few moments after and rotated slightly south while the eastern bound went out of my line of sight behind the building.  i knew i was witnessing a ufo event and reached into my pocket for my cell phone at that point to try to get an image.  then it continued beyond the treeline out of sight.  when i got to the end of the building and looked east for the one heading in that direction it was also gone.  they were shaped like a capsule/tablet.  like pills.  i could see the faint outline of them in a faded white and in the center areas the color was the same as the sky.  i could tell they were either transparent or the same colors of the sky and clouds.  i would have thought them to be clear balloons if it was not for the speed and behaviors.  meeting and pausing then accelerating in opposite directions is not caused by the wind.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects meeting and passing each other.

content.detailedDescription:
1. cooking on the grill
2. friend pointed it out
3. a plane
4. started out as a bright moving star then slowly moved east where it decendedand dimmed out of sight
5. we all didnt really know what to think.It was unexplainable
6.  got behind the tree line
content.summary: Saw what looked like an airplane but did not flash. headed south east and then slowly decended and dimmed out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were enjoying a nice night out in chicago on our way to buckingham fountain. as we were waiting to cross the street we noticed something right away in the sky over the lake. i grabbed my phone and started filming.  we were surprised as i've never seen anything like this in chicago having lived here my entire life.  i continued to film and wondered why no one else seemed to notice or be concerned about it. we had the air and water show a few days after this sighting and wondered if it could have been smaller planes "practicing"? we also noticed a few helicopters flying near but not close to the object(s). i've sent it to a few news stations but have not received any reply or information.
content.summary: Blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving to go get dinner. we were making a left turn onto ventura blvd from reseda.
2. i happened to look up because there was an obvious glowing object with beautiful colors, unlike anything i've ever seen.
3. i knew right away it was unusual and after looking at it i knew it had to be a ufo.
4. it was a cube shaped object, solid in nature, moving very slowly to the southeast. it had a beautiful bright light that surrounded the whole craft that was constantly changing colors. the colors faded into each other. 
5. i was completely in awe and very excited to see it.
6. we were turning left on ventura and we're moving away from the object. we couldn't sit in the middle of the intersection.
content.summary: Cube shaped ufo displaying beautiful colored light which faded from one color to the next. red, orange, yellow, green, magenta, violet, white.

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing for years and stumbled upon the true appearance through shear luck. i decided after looking through my telescope without much detail to try to photograph and enlarge for a better view and the results are mindblowing! i can only describe what these objects are in theory. if i were to have to make a guess at what they are it would be a stargate or a cloaking device or possibly a tear in the time space fabric. i spoke with an astrophysicist retired from the usaf who when i described it to him promptly excused himself and said he could not help me. i have to enlarge the photos to approx 800% to see the true detail and my photo program will not allow me to print or capture at this rate. therefore, i am unable to transmit or print. i am unwilling to blindly send a file of this nature and lose propriety. i have also found a stunning coincidence in the reference background field of stars. this needs to be made public! people need to see this! i am certain there are many more around us. i am willing to repeat the process with one of your field agents present and would request high end optical equipment for a better result as my resources are limited. my guess to the size of these entities are approximately 600-1000 miles across. their distance is approximately five to ten times the distance of the moon. their appearance is similar to highly charged plasma field with at least two pionts of origin. they are constanly moving but seem to stay in a general location. this is substantiated by the reference stars visible in the frames of the photos. the stars in the background will verify that all i'm saying is true and accurate. the initial photos are simply not interesting. the true magic deosn't happen until they are enlarged. the world needs to see these! i am nearly certain that the powers that be know about these and are not talking and covering up as they do with near ufo's. i have never seen this sort of object even in the wildest sci-fy movies or in images from hubble. i could sure use help getting to the truth of these incredible magnificent objects. my wife and i have been studying these for almost seven years and this latest development has just electrified me!
content.summary: Reoccuring nightly visibility permitting have located two one north and one west-northwesterly at approximately same trajectory appear starlike but when magnified  are indescibeable

content.detailedDescription:
I took a picture of the sunrise from a flight from san francisco to phoenix. i reviewed the picture about 30 minutes later and noticed the yellow object to the right in photo. i dont know how high we were flying but we were still climbing and you can see the top of mountains in the background.We were approximately 15 minutes into flight.
a pilot sat beside me on the flight from phoenix to houston, i showed him the picture and he couldnt explain what the object is.
i was sitting in the last seat on aircraft with camera pointed towards the tail away from wings.
content.summary: Picture taken on flight from san francisco to phoenix.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside . i looked westward because i saw a light its like it just appeared or it was traveling in my direction. i knew it was a (asc)arial space craft its white light was like it was power by element 115 . the asc was a brillliant white light that engulfed the craft,beautiful white light. it made my night! the craft went over me and continued east for about 1/4 a mile then the light turned off and then you could see there was something there but i could not make out what it was and then it (jumped) or some people would say it disappeared . otherwise known as the event horizon
content.summary: Beautiful white light engulfed the craft or (asc) arial space craft, could not see the asc because the white light was so brillliant. the asc went strait over my house at 10:15 pm on 8/12/2015. aprox.1300 feet maybe 1500 feet. traveling at 80 mph.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside . i looked westward because i saw a light its like it just appeared or it was traveling in my direction. i knew it was a (asc)arial space craft its white light was like it was power by element 115 . the asc was a brillliant white light that engulfed the craft,beautiful white light. it made my night! the craft went over me and continued east for about 1/4 a mile then the light turned off and then you could see there was something there but i could not make out what it was and then it (jumped) or some people would say it disappeared . otherwise known as the event horizon
content.summary: Beautiful white light engulfed the craft or (asc) arial space craft, could not see the asc because the white light was so brillliant. the asc went strait over my house at 10:15 pm on 8/12/2015. aprox.1300 feet maybe 1500 feet. traveling at 80 mph.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my front yard about 910pm i looked up at the sky and i saw a strange object moving very very slowly the color was very bright white and it was pulsating it did not look like an airplane it look more round or oval so i called my son out to take a look i asked my son if he thought it was a plane or ufo my son said oh my mom it's a ufo he has better eyesight than i do and i said are you sure he said yes mom. the minute he said it was a ufo the ufo got brighter one small orb shot off to the right another small orb shot off to the left and then the larger ufo slowly disappeared definitely not an airplane we also heard a loud sound of a rumbling like a rushing sound. also we live in a residential neighborhood with a lot of trees pine trees around and the strange thing is when i went out to look up at the sky at first it was so quiet you could hear a bird or anything which is not normal and then i started hearing the rushing sound then i noticed the ufo bright light in the sky when the ufo was gone i heard the neighborhood sounds again but before that it was very eerily quiet no sound at all until the rushing rumble sound.
content.summary: Me and my son observed the ufo in the sky moving very slowly with a loud sound it got further in the distance i asked my son if it was a ufo he said yes a object shot off across the sky and one direction another object shut off in another direction opposi

content.detailedDescription: i was standing in front of my house at 2745 cypress ave. with my brother john and a friend mike kaufman one summer afternoon about 3pm in june 1965 and we were bored with nothing to do, so i said let's borrow my dad's car and take a ride to your house mike and he said ok let's go, the three of us got in the car and we drove from my house to mike's house that was just a short drive. when we pulled in the drive way at mike's house we got out of the car turned towards his house and then all three of us looked and said " look a flying saucer ".The flying saucer ufo hovered over his back yard at about 60 feet of the ground,as it hovered it slowly spun. it was a very clear day with the sun shinning and the object was right in front of us just hovering over mike's back yard. it caused so much excitement with us that his mother and sister came out of the house and saw it, those days not many had air conditioned homes we would open all the windows so all his neighbours heard all the yelling and excitement the next i know there were at least two dozen people all out in the street looking at this ufo in amazement. the ufo that would be described as a flying saucer was  over mike's back yard at about 60 feet the same height as the top of a telephone pole hovering for about 10 minutes,i was yelling mike get a camera so he ran in the house and came back out with a camera with no film in it, i then said call the police so his mother went in the house and called the police and when she told them there was a flying saucer over her house they said that it was probably a collage prank and they didn't even come over to check it out and take a report of over two dozen witnesses. i don't know if any of the other witnesses got a picture. i will give a full description of what i saw and the flight it took. when i first saw the ufo it was already there, after about 10 minutes we observed it just hovering and slowly spinning it slowly started to move do west toward new york city gradually going faster in a lateral path i tracked it to where i could only see a speck the size of a "." a pencil point in the sky when all at once it came back in 3 seconds, i never saw anything move that faster, no sound at all was coming from this object. when it came back to the exact same spot all the people were panic stricken and ran screaming into there houses, the three of us remained frozen in place amazed and all of a sudden the ufo started to wobble and then it flipped over like flipping a pan cake  and started to move away from us slowly taking the same path toward new york city do west until it was gone. this was a silver saucer that was the same on top as it was on bottom with a black band that look like tinted glass going around the middle.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a silver disc shaped flying saucer with a black band of what looked like windows around the middle .

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog..Notice a lite in the sky, check security camera feed, saw ufo on 2 occasions in the sky...1st time on 5/19/15 @ 7:32 pm and the 2nd one 6/6/15 8:04pm  those are the daylight sighting of the object...
content.summary: Walking the dog..Notice a lite in the sky, check security camera feed, saw ufo on 2 occasions in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Part two of three cases seen in the same area, now year 2015 instead of 2011, as i was  looking west/north-west towards värnamo from the north-western end of aneboda. there were only a few clouds in the sky, and the blue hue of the sky had almost faded.

during a swedish easter weekend i saw an orange orb which was star/planet-like. i saw it on one night (april 3rd), not on the second night (4th) around the same time, but it was at approximately the same location on the 5th, as on the 3rd. it appeared to be stationary with a white light that would beam slowly in different directions (an actual beam that extended was not visible but one could see the light moving around from the source which acted as a sort of beam or spotlight perhaps). the object did not move on the 3rd but on the 5th it was moving slowly north-west and hid under the trees after viewing it with my mother for about five minutes.
content.summary: Orange orb in sky with a white light

content.detailedDescription:
This is the first report of me witnessing three separate events over different time periods, the latest of which compelled me to report all three. two of the events my father was also a witness, and in one event my mother was a witness. prior to each event, my father and i felt somehow guided to look at the stars. concerning this first event which is reported here, i feel in my heart, beyond any doubt, that this event was somehow planned. 

my father and i wanted to look at the stars this night. it was partly cloudy outside. midnight struck, and my father asked me if i would like to go outside to see the stars. i wholeheartedly agreed. the moment we stepped outside unto the small porch of our summer house, i was directed to look at the skies by a very bright light in the midnight sky. one could have first expected it to be a star, but somehow i knew this was different. it signaled to me with sequential flashes, very much unlike a star, in that the flash was directed towards me. the object was high in the sky due exactly west at an approximate 45-50 degree angle. i immediately told my father to look, after what seemed a split second after i saw the first flash. it was as if the object wanted our attention, and this was its way of communicating to us. after we moved briefly to our driveway for a better view, we stood there flabbergasted for minutes, as this object which was no longer directly flashing at us was performing faint clockwise and counter-clockwise circles. it remained far away and was flickering with blue-white colors. the movements were erratic and elegant, maintaining a relatively linear direction as the object seemed to be slowly ascending as it headed due north/north-west, ending at about an angle of 70-75 degrees before mist rolled in and concealed the object and most stars.

this was my first official ufo encounter, and oddly enough a few nights prior to this i was thinking thoughts that i was ready to see one. i remember clearly how frightened and awed i was by seeing this object, and it is not something to be forced upon anyone else who isn't ready. i wish i had the chance to get visual proof for this, but my phone couldn't capture it in the darkness. i leave the readership to decide on the truth of this matter, but readers should know that i stand by my testimony. every detail i described is what i experienced.
content.summary: Blue-white star-like object flashed initially with a bright white light so that it could be observed -- circled and ascended thereafter
